Title: Grants retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Brian Landers
Summary: Grants retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Brian Landers, for his employment with the village of Lindenhurst which commenced June 19, 2006.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive membership with Tier IV status in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Brian Landers
